entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 5:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
